description: Finite state machine for a minimal Queue example with an Add Item button and a queue container (#queue). Models clicking Add Item, the add operation, success, and failure when DOM targets are missing or invalid.
notes: The only DOM interactive trigger present in the HTML is the Add Item button (button[onclick="addItem()"]). The script references document.getElementById('queue') which exists as #queue. The script also references document.getElementById('item') but no #item element exists in the HTML; that absence is modeled as a possible ADD_FAILURE -> error. ADD_SUCCESS and ADD_FAILURE are internal outcomes of the addItem operation and have no direct DOM selector triggers.
